title: New: STRANGE NAMES – Ricochet
body:
Combining the vibes of both 70s-esque funk and surf rock, [STRANGE NAMES](http://www.

strangenamesmusic.com/)‘s new release is one of my favorite releases from 2014 thus far. The song is catchy, held together by continuous, rhythmic drumming that spans the entire track. [STRANGE NAMES](http://www.strangenamesmusic.com/) are set to release a full-length record this coming Spring. I can’t wait to see what else they have in store. \[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/127577735″ params=”color=ff5500&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
